title: Topic 001 Question 253
body: A solutions architect has created two IAM policies: Policy1 and Policy2. Both policies are attached to an IAM group.
/Amazon AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate SAA-C03 Exam Practice Questions/img/image2.png
/Amazon AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate SAA-C03 Exam Practice Questions/img/image3.png
A cloud engineer is added as an IAM user to the IAM group. Which action will the cloud engineer be able to perform?
options: Deleting logs from Amazon CloudWatch Logs
